channel.title: voice on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in voice on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-19
item.description: Tesla Full Self Driving subscriptions are now available for $199 a month (2 minute read) Tesla’s Full Self Driving package is now available for $199 a month, except for Tesla owners who purchased the Enhanced Autopilot package, who can get it for $99 a month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-01
item.description: Apple adds two brand new Siri voices and will no longer default to a female or male voice in iOS (3 minute read) Siri will no longer default to a female voice in English.
